game.name: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Throw it down in the newest sport league of 2073: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment. Pelt your foes with a barrage of rockets and powerful takedowns to stand on top!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Throw it down in the newest sport league of 2073: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment. Pelt your foes with a barrage of rockets and powerful takedowns to stand on top!
